titleStmt.title: The commendation of cockes, and cock-fighting VVherein is shewed, that cocke-fighting was before the comming of Christ.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, George, fl. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Purfoot] for Henrie Tomes, and are to be sold at his shop ouer against Graies Inne gate in Holburne,

notesStmt.note: Title page in red and black.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop ouer against Graies Inne gate in Holburne
